translations: （尤克牌戏中）阻止（另一玩家）获胜；（非正式）欺骗；防止……在游戏中耍花招

sentences.sentence: After a few months of Scrabble and euchre, I decided it was time to introduce her to word processing.
sentences.translation: 妈妈玩了几个月的拼字游戏和纸牌游戏之后，我认定该向她介绍文字处理系统了。

sentences.sentence: I don't believe I want to play any more "said the youngest a black-haired beauty turned supercilious by fortune as she pushed a euchre hand away from her."
sentences.translation: 我不想打下去了。“三人中最年轻的那个黑发丽人说，她因为好运当头而显得十分傲慢，这时正把一手纸牌从面前推开。”

sentences.sentence: "I don't believe I want to play any more," said the youngest, a black-haired beauty, turned supercilious by fortune, as she pushed a euchre hand away from her.
sentences.translation: “我不想打下去了。”三人中最年轻的那个黑发丽人说，她因为好运当头而显得十分傲慢，这时正把一手纸牌从面前推开。
